pages.text: This Blade, which is said to cut off the Space, is one of relics of Sparta.$(br2)Devoured by the Ender Dragon, it is waiting for the comeback of the Dragon Slayer.$(br2)However, it is broken now.
Above the void of The End, slay the Dragon, and you will see the broken Yamato.
It needs enough courage to pull the broken Yamato out of the dead Dragon's remain.$(br2)Repair it with BladeSoulSphere to reveal its true inner power. It comes from the Devil...
